CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "Forty-foot Drop - This is the 40-foot drop (dotted line) resulting from dismantling work at the 17th St. Incline, which can be reached easily from Arcena St. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two people standing over demolition site of 17th Street Incline with large brick foundation and pile of lumber and debris at bottom
